text: Nikolai Kostromskoy () was a Russian actor, People's Artist of the RSFSR. == Selected filmography == * 1919 — Polikushka * 1920 — Domestic Agitator ==References== == External links == * Николай Костромской on kino-teatr.ru * Category:Russian male film actors Category:20th-century Russian male actors
